text_block_list.name: TV Audio
text_block_list.text: "…Her Highness, studying abroad at Japan's Uma Musume Training Center School, attended a party at the Irish Embassy yesterday-"
It all began on a certain day, early in the afternoon. I was walking home from the Electronics Store when I heard the TV.
Hmmmm, well now… -Ah! Excuse me, you there! Could I have a moment of your time?

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Yes, you! Fufu, I'm sorry for suddenly stopping you. I just had something I'd like to ask.

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Truth is, I wanted to try the "Eat-In Corner" at the convenience store, bought some cup ramen, took a seat and waited but-

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: The person responsible for putting hot water in just hasn't come yet. Perhaps, today is a holiday?
…I told this confused, mysterious girl, that the hot water was self service.

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Eh? It's fine to put the hot water in yourself? That… isn't that-!!

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Waa, for some reason I'm getting excited! And! And! Where is the hot water kept?!

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Fuuaa, that was a lovely experience! To think you could eat at the same place you go shopping, how wonderful!

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Kind person, you have my gratitude for your help. And then next is-

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Would you be so kind as to escort me to "Extreme Noodle Shop"?

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: …Ah, I'm sorry! Ehehe, silly me. "Investigating the destination yourself" is normal, isn't it?
…That's certainly true but, seeing how naive she was earlier, I was a little hesitant to leave her be. That's why-
choice_data_list: Shall I take you to the shop?

text_block_list.name: Ramen Stallkeeper
text_block_list.text: Fuuuuu~~~~~! -SEIYAAAA!!

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Aaah! That… That's definitely the "Extreme" specialty, the "Hot Water Draining Cross"! Amazing, it's the real thing!

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Using this technique they can completely separate the hot water from the rich, golden, chicken bone soup and so you can enjoy the noodles with no slimy texture, or so they say…!

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Ever since I saw it in a net article, I've always wanted to see it for myself! Haaaa… I've been waiting for this moment for 43 days…!

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Using force that could send hot water flying, filling the store with steam… and the anticipation, it's all more than I could have imagined!

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: For bringing me here, I'm very very grateful. I can't thank you enough!
choice_data_list: I don't think I did anything that special…

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: No, that's not true. … after all, I don't think I'll ever forget today!
And thus, this innocent girl with sparkling eyes, for some reason, her profile was burned into my mind…

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Ah, it's already dusk! That's a shame, there was one last place I was looking forward to though.
choice_data_list: If it's one more, we can still make it before curfew
If it's one more, we can still make it before curfew

text_block_list.name: Somewhat Refined Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: That's true, curfews are normally like that, but in my case- Oh.
…Your Highness, excuse me. The agreement was that your outing would last until sun down. Please return to the dorm quickly.
…before I realized it, several suit-wearing adult uma musume were surrounding us. Up until now I never felt their presence though…!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl in a Suit
text_block_list.text: And you, I apologize for interrupting you in the middle of your conversation. However-

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl in a Suit
text_block_list.text: Her Highness, Fine Motion, is heir to the Royal Family. In the off chance, we can't have her exposing herself to danger.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …Thank you for the warning, Commander. Once we've finished exchanging pleasantries, I shall return to the dorm.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Ehe. Sorry for surprising you. I'm truly thankful for today. It will be a very wonderful memory!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -This, is that gratitude!
And thus, she placed something in my palm then closed my hand, and surrounded by the Suit-wearing Uma Musume, they headed to the station.
I saw them off while in a daze, then suddenly, I opened my palm. In it there was-
A coupon for a free extra serving of noodles.
